org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml

Class XpathReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml.AbstractXpathReader
      • org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml.XpathReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ambraproject.rhino.shared.XPathExtractor

    public class XpathReader
extends AbstractXpathReader
implements org.ambraproject.rhino.shared.XPathExtractor
    Implementation of XPathExtractor. This is only used in certain cases where we share code with ambra. For most common cases, you should extend AbstractXpathReader instead of using this.
